front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Authenticated Encryption with Length Expansion for Storage Devices

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Cryptographic and data authentication procedures for storage devices that support length expansion, such as tape drives, are specified. Such procedures include the following cryptographic modes of operation for the AES block cipher: CCM, GCM, CBC-HMAC, and XTS-HMAC.
